comments:
Details:
An error with Library include library

Step:
1.New two library named "libA" and "libB"
2.Open a report design named R1 and include libA.
2.Open libA and include libB, save
3.Reopen libA and R1

Actual result:
1.libA cannot open
2.R1 can not use libA
